comprehensive_overview: R-scrnaseq is an R package designed for preprocessing and analyzing single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) data. It offers a comprehensive suite of tools for quality control, normalization, dimensionality reduction, clustering, differential expression analysis, and visualization of scRNA-seq data.
core_features: Normalization and pre-processing of single-cell gene expression data
Dimensionality reduction techniques such as PCA and t-SNE
Cluster analysis to identify cell populations
Differential expression analysis to identify marker genes
Visualization tools for expression patterns and cluster assignments
